name: The Forgotten Kingdom of Wasteland
startIntroPart1: How lucky we are to be spared from this disaster that happened upon us. Little to none problems, safe place and many great people are around us. Using our strenght, removing any weaknesses, utilizing anything we can a, kingdom was born. Kingdom which in, laws and order were made. Place with working and healthy to an extend society. But I have something to say. Today...  Today is the last day of our isolation. Now, without fear and prejudice we stand in front of a new world. Birthed by forces of the past and the future... As a King I'm obligated to serve my people and my kingdom until death takes me away.
startIntroPart2: I don't know how many bridges we will build, burn and replace. But I know one most improtant thing, whatever lies before our next step. We will overcome it no matter what. We shall show ourselfs to the world.
declaringWar: I really dislike this option but I won't be sorry. Now perish you underling.
attacked: What a cruel thing to do. Nothing more to show? to say? So let my people show what are they capable of.
defeated: We have fallen...? But man like me is not made for defeat, my people strong and resilient... Yet so sheeplish. how could have this came to be?
introduction: Welcome, welcome to my dearest Kingdom. Take a seat with me and don't worry about my citizens, they don't bite. We just like to watch outsiders out of curiosity and interest.
neutralHello: What do you want to say?
hateHello: You are a blister to this world. A Scar that should be forgotten!
tradeRequest: Wouldn't marry a daughter or son of mine?
